lead_paragraph: The Jamaican sprinter Asafa Powell, who shares the 100-meter world record with Justin Gatlin, pulled out of a Greek track meet together with three fellow sprinters from Jamaica after officials at an Italian airport refused to let them take their spikes as carry-on baggage.
